history.text: Hello.
hi
I would like to recommend a movie to you called John Wick.
Who is that
John Wick is the lead protagonist in an action called John Wick
He is played by Keanu Reeves.
oh wow sounds cool. When did it come out
It is a fast paced action thriller and it was released in 2014.
It has gotten good reviews, averaging an 86% on Rotten Tomatoes.
any other good actors?
Michael Nyquist and Alfie Allen are also in it.
And it is directed by Chad Stahelski.
ok, why should I watch
It is a super exiting and thrilling action movie.  I'll explain a little bit of the plot.
please do
John Wick is a retired hitman, who is one of the best hitman in a Russian crime syndicate in NYC.
*was
how many people has he killed

You never find that out, but he was able to retire because he pulled off an "impossible task" given to him by his boss, which included many assassinations
.
wow. sounds intense. what is his goal in this movie
also, rotten tomatoes is unreliable, what was its IMDB rating
Well, the movie starts off with you finding out that his wife recently died.  Before she passed, she bought him a puppy.
puppy? what breed
Not sure what the imdb score is, but the Metacritic score is 68/100 and the CinemaScore is a B.
what breed of puppy is it
I forget what breed, but anyway a member of the Russian syndicate steals John's car and kills the puppy in an act of rage.
wow is this movie really violent?
So the goal of John for the whole movie is to pretty much kill his was up to the top of the syndicate to get revenge.
cool, is it on DVD
It is quite violent indeed.  He kills a lot of people throughout, including most of the Russian boss's (Viggo) henchmen.
I am not sure it is on DVD, but I would assume it is since it came out a couple of years ago.
oh great, would you reccomend me watchinh?
Yes for sure.  I don't want to ruin the ending, but lets just say it involved a fight between John and his boss.
thanks

uid1response.feedback: John Wick sounds like a really good action thriller

uid2response.feedback: The other user seemed interested in the movie.
